Package com.hexaware.dao

Class ReservationDao

java.lang.Object
com.hexaware.dao.ReservationDao
public class ReservationDao extends Object
This class provides methods to interact with the Reservation database table.

  • Method Details

    • getReservationById

      public Reservation getReservationById(int reservationId) throws SQLException, DatabaseConnectionException, ReservationException
      Retrieves a reservation by its ID from the database.
      Parameters:
      reservationId - The ID of the reservation to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The reservation object if found.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.
      DatabaseConnectionException - If there is an issue with the database connection.
      ReservationException - If the reservation with the given ID is not found.

    • getReservationsByCustomerId

      public List<Reservation> getReservationsByCustomerId(int customerId) throws SQLException, DatabaseConnectionException, CustomerNotFoundException
      Retrieves a list of reservations by customer ID from the database.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The ID of the customer whose reservations to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A list of reservation objects for the customer.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.
      DatabaseConnectionException - If there is an issue with the database connection.
      CustomerNotFoundException - If the customer with the given ID is not found.

    • createReservation

      public void createReservation(Reservation reservation) throws SQLException, DatabaseConnectionException
      Creates a new reservation in the database.
      Parameters:
      reservation - The reservation object to create.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.
      DatabaseConnectionException - If there is an issue with the database connection.

    • updateReservation

      public boolean updateReservation(int reservationId) throws SQLException, DatabaseConnectionException, ReservationException
      Updates the status of a reservation in the database.
      Parameters:
      reservationId - The ID of the reservation to update.
      Returns:
      True if the update is successful, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.
      DatabaseConnectionException - If there is an issue with the database connection.
      ReservationException - If the reservation with the given ID is not found.

    • CancelReservation

      public boolean CancelReservation(int reservationId) throws SQLException, DatabaseConnectionException, ReservationException
      Cancels a reservation in the database.
      Parameters:
      reservationId - The ID of the reservation to cancel.
      Returns:
      True if the cancellation is successful, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.
      DatabaseConnectionException - If there is an issue with the database connection.
      ReservationException - If the reservation with the given ID is not found.

    • getAllReservationDetails

      public List<Reservation> getAllReservationDetails() throws SQLException, DatabaseConnectionException
      Retrieves a list of all reservations from the database.
      Returns:
      A list of all reservation objects.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.
      DatabaseConnectionException - If there is an issue with the database connection.

    • getVehicleUtilization

      public Map<Integer,Integer> getVehicleUtilization() throws SQLException, DatabaseConnectionException
      Retrieves the vehicle utilization statistics from the database.
      Returns:
      A map of vehicle IDs to their respective utilization counts.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.
      DatabaseConnectionException - If there is an issue with the database connection.

    • getTotalRevenueByVehicle

      public Map<Integer,Double> getTotalRevenueByVehicle() throws SQLException, DatabaseConnectionException
      Retrieves the total revenue generated by each vehicle from the database.
      Returns:
      A map of vehicle IDs to their respective total revenue amounts.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.
      DatabaseConnectionException - If there is an issue with the database connection.

    • getTotalRevenueByCustomer

      public Map<Integer,Double> getTotalRevenueByCustomer() throws SQLException, DatabaseConnectionException
      Retrieves the total revenue generated by each customer from the database.
      Returns:
      A map of customer IDs to their respective total revenue amounts.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.
      DatabaseConnectionException - If there is an issue with the database connection.
